summary: Implements a backend that connects the TXI language model (through the py_txi library) to the Optimum Benchmark platform, managing model acquisition, weight loading (including empty-weight and fast initialization), input preprocessing, generation settings, and execution of forward passes for text generation and embedding extraction. Accompanies a configuration dataclass that supplies default parameters, reads environment overrides, detects available GPU platforms, and lists supported benchmark task categories.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use integration that allows users to benchmark TXI models efficiently within the Optimum suite, offering fast model initialization, flexible task configuration, and hardware‑aware execution for both generation and embedding workloads.
